lead_paragraph: Mr. Gandhi, widely expected to take over leadership of the Indian National Congress party, returned to New Delhi after 57 days, having said he needed to “reflect on recent events.”

headline.print_headline: An Indian Heir Apparent Ends a Secretive Absence
headline.main: Rahul Gandhi, an Heir Apparent in India, Ends a Secretive Absence

snippet: Mr. Gandhi, widely expected to take over leadership of the Indian National Congress party, returned to New Delhi after 57 days, having said he needed to “reflect on recent events.”
abstract: Rahul Gandhi, heir apparent in Indian National Congress party, returns from two month sabbatical, offering little explanation for his absence.
